Published July 6 2015

Space stuff in its natural habitat

James Yoder combined the data from Space-Track.org with the rendering magic of WebGL to create a 3D visiualization of all the stuff (debris, satellites, and rocket bodies) currently orbiting the Earth. Fantastic domain too: StuffIn.Space.

Enjoy your day.
